text: Sergey Danilin (1 January 1960 – 4 October 2021) was a Soviet luger. He competed from the early 1980s to the mid-1990s. He was in four Winter Olympics. He won the silver medal in the men's singles event at Sarajevo in 1984. Danilin died on 4 October 2021 at the age of 61.Умер вице-чемпион Олимпиады-1984 саночник Сергей Данилин ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Lugers
title: Sergey Danilin
